languages.text: {n}Девушка отводит взгляд и с достоинством поправляет налобное украшение.{/n} "С вашего позволения, я бы хотела провести немного времени наедине".

traits.locale_text: {n}Девушка отводит взгляд и с достоинством поправляет налобное украшение.{/n} "С вашего позволения, я бы хотела провести немного времени наедине".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}She averts her gaze and adjusts the adornment on her forehead with dignity.{/n} "By your leave, I would like to spend some time alone."
languages.original_text: {n}Девушка отводит взгляд и с достоинством поправляет налобное украшение.{/n} "С вашего позволения, я бы хотела провести немного времени наедине".

traits.locale_text: {n}She averts her gaze and adjusts the adornment on her forehead with dignity, instantly dousing all emotion.{/n} "By your leave, I would like to spend some time alone."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}She averts her gaze and adjusts the adornment on her forehead with dignity, instantly dousing all emotion.{/n} "By your leave, I would like to spend some time alone."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}She averts her gaze and adjusts the adornment on her forehead with dignity, instantly dousing all emotion.{/n} "By your leave, I would like to spend some time alone."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}She averts her gaze and adjusts the adornment on her forehead with dignity.{/n} "By your leave, I would like to spend some time alone."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}她移开了目光，庄重地调整着额头上的装饰。{/n}“如果你允许的话，我想独自呆一会儿。”
languages.original_text: {n}She averts her gaze and adjusts the adornment on her forehead with dignity.{/n} "By your leave, I would like to spend some time alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}她移开了目光，庄重地调整着额头上的装饰，所有的情绪都被熄灭了。{/n}“如果你允许的话，我想独自呆一会儿。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Aparta la vista y se ajusta el adorno de la frente con dignidad.{/n} «Con permiso, me gustaría estar un rato a solas».
languages.original_text: {n}She averts her gaze and adjusts the adornment on her forehead with dignity.{/n} "By your leave, I would like to spend some time alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aparta la vista y se ajusta el adorno de la frente con dignidad, extinguiendo toda emoción.{/n} «Con permiso, me gustaría estar un rato a solas».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼女は視線をそらし、重々しく額の飾りを整える。{/n}「よろしければ、独りにしていただけないでしょうか」
languages.original_text: {n}She averts her gaze and adjusts the adornment on her forehead with dignity.{/n} "By your leave, I would like to spend some time alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は視線をそらし、重々しく額の飾りを整える。{/n}「よろしければ、独りにしていただけないでしょうか」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sie wendet den Blick ab und rückt würdevoll den Zierschmuck auf ihrer Stirn gerade.{/n} "Wenn Ihr es erlaubt, wäre ich gerne eine Weile allein."
languages.original_text: {n}She averts her gaze and adjusts the adornment on her forehead with dignity.{/n} "By your leave, I would like to spend some time alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie wendet den Blick ab und rückt würdevoll den Zierschmuck auf ihrer Stirn gerade. Sämtliche Emotionen sind augenblicklich erloschen.{/n} "Wenn Ihr es erlaubt, wäre ich gerne eine Weile allein."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Elle détourne le regard et ajuste l'ornement sur sa tête pour se redonner contenance.{/n} « J'aimerais être seule un moment. »
languages.original_text: {n}She averts her gaze and adjusts the adornment on her forehead with dignity.{/n} "By your leave, I would like to spend some time alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle détourne le regard et ajuste dignement l'ornement sur sa tête pour se redonner contenance.{/n} « J'aimerais être seule un moment. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}She averts her gaze and adjusts the adornment on her forehead with dignity.{/n} "By your leave, I would like to spend some time alone."

languages.text: {n}Cassia, bakışlarını kaçırıp ağırbaşlılıkla alnındaki süsü düzeltiyor.{/n} "İzninle biraz yalnız kalmak istiyorum Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: {n}She averts her gaze and adjusts the adornment on her forehead with dignity.{/n} "By your leave, I would like to spend some time alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia bakışını kaçırıp ağırbaşlılıkla alnındaki süsü düzeltiyor.{/n} "Gittiğinde biraz yalnız kalmak istiyorum Lord Kaptan."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
